name: Major League Baseball Players Assn. v. Garvey
court: Supreme Court of the United States
reasoning: Garvey moved in Federal District Court to vacate the arbitrator's award, alleging that the arbitrator violated the Framework by denying his claim. The District Court denied the motion. The Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit reversed by a divided vote.

precedent.name: Garvey I
precedent.court: Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit

precedent.court: Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit
